message.name: ERR_BANKACCOUNT_FV_PRIMARYBANKIND
message.locale: You cannot modify a primary bank account when the bank account status is closed.

message.name: ERR_BANKACCOUNT_FV_TYPECODE_JOINT
message.locale: You cannot change a joint account type.

message.name: ERR_BANKACCOUNT_FV_PAYMENT_ISSUED
message.locale: A payment has been issued to this bank account, therefore the modification cannot be applied. A new bank account should be created.

message.name: ERR_BANKACCOUNT_FV_PAYMENT_SCHEDULED
message.locale: A payment has been scheduled for this bank account. The modification cannot be applied until an alternative bank account is specified for the scheduled payment.

message.name: ERR_BANKACCOUNT_XFV_CANNOT_TRANSFER_TO_EXISTING
message.locale: The bank account you have selected is the same as the account you are trying to transfer from.

message.name: ERR_BANKACCOUNT_XRV_NO_PAYMENTS_DUE
message.locale: There are currently no transactions due on the bank account you are trying to transfer from.

message.name: ERR_BANKACCOUNT_XRV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT_NO_TRANSFER
message.locale: A client that is currently marked as a duplicate cannot transfer account details.

message.name: INF_BANKACCOUNT_PAYMENT_SCHEDULED
message.locale: The bank account has been closed or the end date set. If there are payments scheduled to this Bank Account, they will not be issued.

message.name: ERR_BANKACCOUNT_FV_ACCOUNT_CANCELED
message.locale: This bank account has been canceled and cannot be modified.
This bank account has been cancelled and cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_BANKACCOUNT_XFV_TRANSFER_NO_ACCOUNT_SELECTED
message.locale: A bank account to transfer to must be selected.
